name: live-editor-reload
description: A small utility for developing Atom packages. Automatically reload Atom when you save a file that's part of an Atom package.
readme:
# live-editor-reload

> A small utility for developing Atom packages. Automatically reload Atom when you save a file that's part of an Atom package.

**Requirements:**

- Editor must be in dev mode
- Atom must be listed in package's engines
